## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the existing style (argparse, `run(argv)` pattern)
- [ ] I've added the tool to `cli.py` (TOOLS dict + dispatch)
- [ ] Tool works with `--help` flag
- [ ] I've tested on my local machine
- [ ] No external dependencies added (stdlib only)

## How to Test
```bash
python -m devtoolkit <command> [args]
```
